name: upholder
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person or organization that upholds (= defends) a law, a principle, or a decision that has been made: She joined the police force and became an upholder of law and order. Many of these men are regarded as upholders of public morality. See
uphold
More examplesFewer examplesYour country has an enviable reputation as a champion of freedom and upholder of standards of decency. He sees himself as the ultimate upholder of family values.He has a reputation as a staunch upholder of the traditions of golf.
